starwars.entities.actors

Class StormTrooper

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Entity
      • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Actor<SWActionInterface>
        • starwars.SWActor
          • starwars.entities.actors.StormTrooper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityInterface, SWEntityInterface

    public class StormTrooper
extends SWActor
    Class for Stormtroopers A soldier of the Empire. Will protect Vader at all costs - will try to call for backup if needed also, which can be a problem for the player!
    Author:
    jas, mewc

    • Constructor Detail

      • StormTrooper

        public StormTrooper(MessageRenderer m,
                    SWWorld world)
        Constructor for a StormTrooper soldier. They are of team EVIL, and wander about on the Death Star in search for Luke and compatriots.
        Parameters:
        m - MessageRenderer to display messages.
        world - the SWWorld world to which this StormTrooper belongs to

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        act() method for StormTrooper Implements the StormTrooper actions - which is extremely similar to Tusken Raiders. If they come across an enemy, they will have a 75% chance of hitting their enemy - as these soldiers are known to be springy and sometimes take actions that would not be suitable for a situation! StormTrooper can also call for backup - which will create a new StormTrooper in the same map - who can also call for backup!
        Specified by:
        act in class Actor<SWActionInterface>
